comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
The Litmus test suite is now a part of the integrationTesting profile.

Apart from two known issues (JCR-2637 and JCR-2638) the tests run fine. Resolving as fixed.

description: It would be great to integrate the litmus tests (http://www.webdav.org/neon/litmus/) to our integration test suite.
summary: Include the WebDAV litmus tests in the Jackrabbit integration tests
